text: Doña Micaëla Cousiño y Quiñones de León (Micaëla Ana María; 30 April 1938 – 13 March 2022) was a Chilean-Spanish royal consort. She was the second wife of Henri, Count of Paris from 1999 until his death in 2019. Micaëla died on 13 March 2022 at the age of 83.Décès de la princesse Micaela : la belle-mère du comte de Paris avait 83 ans ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chilean people Category:Spanish royalty
title: Micaela, Countess of Paris
